fr.ign.cogit.geoxygene.function

Interface Function1D

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractFunction1D, ComposeFunction, ConstantFunction, GaussFunction, IdentityFunction, InverseSigmoidFunction, LinearFunction, NoiseFunction, PiecewiseFunction, SinFunction, StringFunction, ZeroToOneFunction

    public interface Function1D
    Author:
    JeT these functions are used to evaluate a simple function depending on a 1D variable

        Double evaluate(double x)
         throws FunctionEvaluationException
        Compute the function value
        Parameters:
        x - variable value used to compute function value
        Returns:
